original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields up at close, rupee at 317.50/318 against the USD
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s bond yields were slightly up at close on Tuesday, while the rupee closed at 317.80/318 against the US dollar in the spot market, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.09.2027 closed at 28.30/50 percent, slightly up from 28.00/30 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 closed at 30.00/25 percent on Tuesday, down from 29.25/30 percent at last close.
The rupee closed at 317.50/318.50 against the US dollar in the spot market appreciated from the last close at 319.00/40. (Colombo/May09/2023)
